mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Employee (empNo, nm, passwd, email, birthDt, enterDt, retireDt, deptCd, teamCd, gradeCd, positCd, phoneNo, addr) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{nm}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{birthDt}, #{enterDt}, #{retireDt}, #{deptCd}, #{teamCd}, #{gradeCd}, #{positCd}, #{phoneNo}, #{addr})
mapper.update: UPDATE Employee SET nm = #{nm}, passwd = #{passwd}, email = #{email}, birthDt = #{birthDt}, enterDt = #{enterDt}, retireDt= #{retireDt}, deptCd = #{deptCd}, teamCd = #{teamCd}, gradeCd = #{gradeCd}, positCd = #{positCd}, phoneNo = #{phoneNo}, addr = #{addr} WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
